comedyMovies.title: Sorry to Bother you
comedyMovies.description: An alternate present-day version of Oakland, telemarketer Cassius Green discovers a magical key to professional success, propelling him into a universe of greed.
comedyMovies.stars: Lakeith Stanfield, Tessa Thompson, Jermaine Fowler

comedyMovies.title: Night School
comedyMovies.description: A group of troublemakers are found to attend night school in hope that they’ll pass the GED exam to finish high school.
comedyMovies.stars: Tiffany Haddish, Kevin Hart, Keith David

comedyMovies.title: Mamma Mia!
comedyMovies.description: Five years after the events of Mamma Mia! (2008), Sophie prepares for the grand opening of the Hotel Bella Donna as she learns more about her mother’s past.
comedyMovies.stars: Lily James, Amanda Seyfried, Meryl Streep

comedyMovies.title: Book Club
comedyMovies.description: Four lifelong friends have their lives forever changed after reading 50 shades of Grey in their monthly book club.
comedyMovies.stars: Diane Keaton, Jane Fonda, Candice Bergen
